messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-1: A project shall not contain unreachable code.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-1: A project shall not contain unreachable code.
messages.translation: 项目不得包含不可达代码

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-2: A project shall not contain infeasible paths.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-2: A project shall not contain infeasible paths.
messages.translation: 项目不得包含不可行路径

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-3: A project shall not contain unused variables.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-3: A project shall not contain unused variables.
messages.translation: 项目不得包含未使用的变量

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-4: A project shall not contain non-volatile POD variables having only one use.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-4: A project shall not contain non-volatile POD variables having only one use.
messages.translation: 项目不得包含只使用一次的非易失性（non-volatile）POD变量

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-5: A project shall not contain unused type declarations.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-5: A project shall not contain unused type declarations.
messages.translation: 项目不得包含未使用的类型声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-6: A project shall not contain instances of non-volatile variables being given values that are never subsequently used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-6: A project shall not contain instances of non-volatile variables being given values that are never subsequently used.
messages.translation: 项目不得含有“非易失性变量被赋值，随后始终未使用该值”的实例

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-7: The value returned by a function having a non-void return type that is not an overloaded operator shall always be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-7: The value returned by a function having a non-void return type that is not an overloaded operator shall always be used.
messages.translation: 不是重载运算符的函数，若其返回类型为非 void，则必须使用其返回值

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-8: All functions with void return type shall have external side effect(s).
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-8: All functions with void return type shall have external side effect(s).
messages.translation: 具有 void 返回类型的函数必须有外部副作用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-9: There shall be no dead code.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-9: There shall be no dead code.
messages.translation: 不得存在死代码

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-10: Every defined function shall be called at least once.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-10: Every defined function shall be called at least once.
messages.translation: 每个被定义的函数必须至少被调用一次

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-11: There shall be no unused parameters (named or unnamed) in non-virtual functions.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-11: There shall be no unused parameters (named or unnamed) in non-virtual functions.
messages.translation: 非虚（non-virtual）函数中不得存在未使用的形参（无论命名或未命名）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-12: There shall be no unused parameters (named or unnamed) in the set of parameters for a virtual function and all the functions that override it.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-1-12: There shall be no unused parameters (named or unnamed) in the set of parameters for a virtual function and all the functions that override it.
messages.translation: 在一个虚拟函数和所有覆盖了它的函数的形参集中，不得有未使用的（命名或未命名）形参

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-2-1: An object shall not be assigned to an overlapping object.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-2-1: An object shall not be assigned to an overlapping object.
messages.translation: 不得将对象分配给重叠的对象

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-3-1: Minimization of run-time failures shall be ensured by the use of at least one of: (a) static analysis tools/techniques; (b) dynamic tools/techniques; (c) explicit coding of checks to handle run-time faults.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-3-1: Minimization of run-time failures shall be ensured by the use of at least one of: (a) static analysis tools/techniques; (b) dynamic tools/techniques; (c) explicit coding of checks to handle run-time faults.
messages.translation: 必须通过使用以下至少一种方法来确保尽量减少运行时失败（run-time failure）：（a）静态分析工具/技术；（b）动态工具/技术；（c）处理运行时失败的显式代码

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-3-2: If a function generates error information, then that error information shall be tested.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-3-2: If a function generates error information, then that error information shall be tested.
messages.translation: 如果函数返回了错误信息，那么必须测试该错误信息

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-4-1: Use of scaled-integer or fixed-point arithmetic shall be documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-4-1: Use of scaled-integer or fixed-point arithmetic shall be documented.
messages.translation: 缩放整型（scaled-integer）算术或定点算术的使用必须有文档记录

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-4-2: Use of floating-point arithmetic shall be documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-4-2: Use of floating-point arithmetic shall be documented.
messages.translation: 浮点算术的使用必须有文档记录

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-4-3: Floating-point implementations shall comply with a defined floating-point standard.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 0-4-3: Floating-point implementations shall comply with a defined floating-point standard.
messages.translation: 浮点实现必须与定义的浮点标准相符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 1-0-1: All code shall conform to ISO/IEC 14882:2003 "The C++ Standard Incorporating Technical Corrigendum 1".
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 1-0-1: All code shall conform to ISO/IEC 14882:2003 "The C++ Standard Incorporating Technical Corrigendum 1".
messages.translation: 所有代码必须遵循 ISO/IEC 14882:2003 C++标准，包括技术勘误1

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 1-0-2: Multiple compilers shall only be used if they have a common, defined interface.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 1-0-2: Multiple compilers shall only be used if they have a common, defined interface.
messages.translation: 只有在编译器使用同一个指定接口时才能使用多个编译器

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 1-0-3: The implementation of integer division in the chosen compiler shall be determined and documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 1-0-3: The implementation of integer division in the chosen compiler shall be determined and documented.
messages.translation: 在选定的编译器中进行整型除法时，必须确定并记录它的实现

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-2-1: The character set and the corresponding encoding shall be documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-2-1: The character set and the corresponding encoding shall be documented.
messages.translation: 字符集及对应的编码必须有文档记录

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-3-1: Trigraphs shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-3-1: Trigraphs shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用三字符组

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-5-1: Digraphs should not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-5-1: Digraphs should not be used.
messages.translation: 不应使用双字符组（digraph）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-7-1: The character sequence /* shall not be used within a C-style comment.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-7-1: The character sequence /* shall not be used within a C-style comment.
messages.translation: 不得在C语言风格的注释中使用字符序列 /*

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-7-2: Sections of code shall not be "commented out" using C-style comments.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-7-2: Sections of code shall not be "commented out" using C-style comments.
messages.translation: 不得使用C语言风格的注释将代码段“注释掉”

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-7-3: Sections of code should not be "commented out" using C++ comments.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-7-3: Sections of code should not be "commented out" using C++ comments.
messages.translation: 不应使用C++注释将代码段“注释掉”

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-1: Different identifiers shall be typographically unambiguous.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-1: Different identifiers shall be typographically unambiguous.
messages.translation: 必须确保标识符使用不易混淆的排版

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-2: Identifiers declared in an inner scope shall not hide an identifier declared in an outer scope.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-2: Identifiers declared in an inner scope shall not hide an identifier declared in an outer scope.
messages.translation: 在内部作用域中声明的标识符不得隐藏在外部作用域中声明的标识符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-3: A typedef name (including qualification, if any) shall be a unique identifier.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-3: A typedef name (including qualification, if any) shall be a unique identifier.
messages.translation: 类型定义（typedef）名称（如有修饰，那么也包括修饰）必须是唯一标识符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-4: A class, union or enum name (including qualification, if any) shall be a unique identifier.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-4: A class, union or enum name (including qualification, if any) shall be a unique identifier.
messages.translation: 类、联合体或枚举的名称（如有修饰，那么也包括修饰）必须是唯一标识符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-5: The identifier name of a non-member object or function with static storage duration should not be reused.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-5: The identifier name of a non-member object or function with static storage duration should not be reused.
messages.translation: 具有静态存储周期的非成员对象或函数的标识符名称不应重复使用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-6: If an identifier refers to a type, it shall not also refer to an object or a function in the same scope.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-10-6: If an identifier refers to a type, it shall not also refer to an object or a function in the same scope.
messages.translation: 如果一个标识符已经指代了一个类型，那么在同一作用域内，它不得用于指代一个对象或一个函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-1: Only those escape sequences that are defined in ISO/IEC 14882:2003 shall be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-1: Only those escape sequences that are defined in ISO/IEC 14882:2003 shall be used.
messages.translation: 只能使用ISO/IEC 14882:2003中定义的转义序列

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-2: Octal constants (other than zero) and octal escape sequences (other than "\0") shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-2: Octal constants (other than zero) and octal escape sequences (other than "\0") shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用八进制常量（零除外）和八进制转义序列（“\0”除外）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-3: A "U" suffix shall be applied to all octal or hexadecimal integer literals of unsigned type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-3: A "U" suffix shall be applied to all octal or hexadecimal integer literals of unsigned type.
messages.translation: 必须对所有八进制或十六进制的无符号整型字面量使用后缀“U”

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-4: Literal suffixes shall be upper case.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-4: Literal suffixes shall be upper case.
messages.translation: 字面量后缀必须是大写字母

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-5: Narrow and wide string literals shall not be concatenated.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 2-13-5: Narrow and wide string literals shall not be concatenated.
messages.translation: 不得将宽字符串字面量和窄字符串字面量串接

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-1-1: It shall be possible to include any header file in multiple translation units without violaing the One Definition Rule.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-1-1: It shall be possible to include any header file in multiple translation units without violaing the One Definition Rule.
messages.translation: 在不违反“单一定义”规则的情况下，可以在多个翻译单元中包含任何头文件

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-1-2: Functions shall not be declared at block scope.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-1-2: Functions shall not be declared at block scope.
messages.translation: 不得在块作用域内声明函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-1-3: When an array is declared, its size shall either be stated explicitly or defined implicitly by initialization.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-1-3: When an array is declared, its size shall either be stated explicitly or defined implicitly by initialization.
messages.translation: 声明一个数组时，必须显式说明其大小，或通过初始化隐式定义其大小

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-1: All declarations of an object or function shall have compatible types.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-1: All declarations of an object or function shall have compatible types.
messages.translation: 一个对象或函数的所有声明的类型必须兼容

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-2: The One Definition Rule shall not be violated.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-2: The One Definition Rule shall not be violated.
messages.translation: 不得违反单一定义规则

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-3: A type, object or function that is used in multiple translation units shall be declared in one and only one file.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-3: A type, object or function that is used in multiple translation units shall be declared in one and only one file.
messages.translation: 在多个翻译单元中使用的类型、对象或函数必须在且仅在文件中声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-4: An identifier with external linkage shall have exactly one definition.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-2-4: An identifier with external linkage shall have exactly one definition.
messages.translation: 一个具有外部链接的标识符必须有且仅有一个定义

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-3-1: Objects or functions with external linkage shall be declared in a header file.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-3-1: Objects or functions with external linkage shall be declared in a header file.
messages.translation: 含有外部链接的对象或函数必须在一个头文件中声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-3-2: If a function has internal linkage then all re-declarations shall include the static storage class specifier.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-3-2: If a function has internal linkage then all re-declarations shall include the static storage class specifier.
messages.translation: 如果一个函数有内部链接，那么所有的重新声明都必须包括静态（static）存储类说明符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-4-1: An identfier declared to be an object or type shall be defined in a block that minimizes its visibility.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-4-1: An identfier declared to be an object or type shall be defined in a block that minimizes its visibility.
messages.translation: 声明为对象或类型的标识符必须在一个使其可见性最低的代码块中定义

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-9-1: The types used for an object, a function return type, or a function parameter shalll be token-for-token identical in all declarations and re-declarations.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-9-1: The types used for an object, a function return type, or a function parameter shalll be token-for-token identical in all declarations and re-declarations.
messages.translation: 在所有声明和重新声明中，用于对象、函数返回类型或函数参数的类型的每个词符必须对应相同

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-9-2: typedefs that indicate size and signedness should be used in place of the basic numerical types.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-9-2: typedefs that indicate size and signedness should be used in place of the basic numerical types.
messages.translation: 应使用指示大小和符号性的类型定义（typedef）代替基本数据类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-9-3: The underlying bit representations of floating-point values shall not be used .
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 3-9-3: The underlying bit representations of floating-point values shall not be used .
messages.translation: 不得使用浮点值的底层位表示（underlying bit representations）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-5-1: Expressions with type bool shall not be used as operands to built-in operators other than the assignment operator =, the logical operators &&, ||, !, the equality operators == and !=, the unary & operator, and the conditional operator.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-5-1: Expressions with type bool shall not be used as operands to built-in operators other than the assignment operator =, the logical operators &&, ||, !, the equality operators == and !=, the unary & operator, and the conditional operator.
messages.translation: 不得将具有bool类型的表达式用作内置运算符的操作数，以下运算符除外：赋值运算符=、逻辑运算符&&、||和!、相等运算符==和!=、一元运算符&以及条件运算符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-5-2: Expressions with type enum shall not be used as operands to built-in operators other than the subscript operator [ ], the assignment operator =, the equality operators == and !=, the unary & operator, and the relational operators <, <=, >, >=.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-5-2: Expressions with type enum shall not be used as operands to built-in operators other than the subscript operator [ ], the assignment operator =, the equality operators == and !=, the unary & operator, and the relational operators <, <=, >, >=.
messages.translation: 不得将具有枚举类型的表达式用作内置运算符的操作数，以下运算符除外：下标运算符[ ]、赋值运算符=、相等运算符==和!=、一元运算符&以及关系运算符<、<=、>和>=

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-5-3: Expressions with type (plain) char and wchar_t shall not be used as operands to built-in operators other than the assignment operator =, the equality operators == and !=, and the unary & operator.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-5-3: Expressions with type (plain) char and wchar_t shall not be used as operands to built-in operators other than the assignment operator =, the equality operators == and !=, and the unary & operator.
messages.translation: 不得将具有（普通）char和wchar_t类型的表达式用作内置运算符的操作数，以下运算符除外：赋值运算符=、相等运算符==和!=以及一元运算符&

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-10-1: NULL shall not be used as an integer value.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-10-1: NULL shall not be used as an integer value.
messages.translation: NULL不得用作整型值

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-10-2: Literal zero (0) shall not be used as the null-pointer-constant
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 4-10-2: Literal zero (0) shall not be used as the null-pointer-constant
messages.translation: 字面量零（0）不得用作空指针常量

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-1: The value of an expression shall be the same under any order of evaluation that the standard permits.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-1: The value of an expression shall be the same under any order of evaluation that the standard permits.
messages.translation: 无论采取何种求值顺序（只要允许采用该顺序），表达式的值不得发生改变

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-2: Limited dependence should be placed on C++ operator precedence rules in expressions.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-2: Limited dependence should be placed on C++ operator precedence rules in expressions.
messages.translation: 在表达式中，应有限地依赖C++运算符优先级规则

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-3: A cvalue expression shall not be implicitly converted to a different underlying type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-3: A cvalue expression shall not be implicitly converted to a different underlying type.
messages.translation: 不得将c值表达式隐式转换为其他底层类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-4: An implicit integral conversion shall not change the signedness of the underlying type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-4: An implicit integral conversion shall not change the signedness of the underlying type.
messages.translation: 隐式整型转换不得改变底层类型的符号性

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-5: There shall be no implicit floating-integral conversions.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-5: There shall be no implicit floating-integral conversions.
messages.translation: 不得存在隐式的浮点-整型转换

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-6: An implicit integral or floating-point conversion shall not reduce the size of the underlying type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-6: An implicit integral or floating-point conversion shall not reduce the size of the underlying type.
messages.translation: 隐式的整型或浮点转换不得减小底层类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-7: There shall be no explicit floating-integral conversions of a cvalue expression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-7: There shall be no explicit floating-integral conversions of a cvalue expression.
messages.translation: c值表达式不得存在显式的浮点-整型转换

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-8: An explicit integral or floating-point conversion shall not increase the size of the underlying type of a cvalue expression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-8: An explicit integral or floating-point conversion shall not increase the size of the underlying type of a cvalue expression.
messages.translation: 显式的整型或浮点转换不得增大c值表达式的底层类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-9: An explicit integral conversion shall not change the signedness of the underlying type of a cvalue expression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-9: An explicit integral conversion shall not change the signedness of the underlying type of a cvalue expression.
messages.translation: 显式的整型转换不得改变c值表达式的底层类型的符号性

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-10: If the bitwise operators ~ and << are applied to an operand with an underlying type of unsigned char or unsigned short, the result shall be immediately cast to the underlying type of the operand.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-10: If the bitwise operators ~ and << are applied to an operand with an underlying type of unsigned char or unsigned short, the result shall be immediately cast to the underlying type of the operand.
messages.translation: 如果对底层类型为无符号char或无符号short的操作数应用按位操作符~和<<，其结果必须立即转换为该操作数的底层类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-11: The plain char type shall only be used for the storage and use of character values.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-11: The plain char type shall only be used for the storage and use of character values.
messages.translation: 简单的char类型只得用于存储和使用字符值

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-12: signed char and unsigned char type shall only be used for the storage and use of numeric values.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-12: signed char and unsigned char type shall only be used for the storage and use of numeric values.
messages.translation: 有符号char和无符号char类型只得用于存储和使用数字值

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-13: The condition of an if-statement and the condition of an iteration-statement shall have type bool.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-13: The condition of an if-statement and the condition of an iteration-statement shall have type bool.
messages.translation: if语句的条件和迭代语句的条件都必须具有bool类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-14: The first operand of a conditional-operator shall have type bool.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-14: The first operand of a conditional-operator shall have type bool.
messages.translation: 条件运算符的第一个操作数必须为bool类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-15: Array indexing shall be the only form of pointer arithmetic.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-15: Array indexing shall be the only form of pointer arithmetic.
messages.translation: 指针算术只能以数组索引的形式进行

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-16: A pointer operand and any pointer resulting from pointer arithmetic using that operand shall both address elements of the same array.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-16: A pointer operand and any pointer resulting from pointer arithmetic using that operand shall both address elements of the same array.
messages.translation: 指针操作数，以及任何使用该操作数经过指针算术得到的指针，必须对同一数组的元素寻址

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-17: Subtraction between pointers shall only be applied to pointers that address elements of the same array.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-17: Subtraction between pointers shall only be applied to pointers that address elements of the same array.
messages.translation: 只能将指针相减应用于对同一数组的指针寻址

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-18: >, >=, <, <= shall not be applied to objects of pointer type, except where they point to the same array.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-18: >, >=, <, <= shall not be applied to objects of pointer type, except where they point to the same array.
messages.translation: 不得对类型为指针的对象应用>、>=、<、<=，除非它们指向同一数组

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-19: The declaration of objects shall contain no more than two levels of pointer indirection.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-19: The declaration of objects shall contain no more than two levels of pointer indirection.
messages.translation: 对象的声明不得包含超过两级的指针间接

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-20: Non-constant operands to a binary bitwise operator shall have the same underlying type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-20: Non-constant operands to a binary bitwise operator shall have the same underlying type.
messages.translation: 二元按位运算符的非常量操作数必须具有相同的底层类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-21: Bitwise operators shall only be applied to operands of unsigned underlying type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-0-21: Bitwise operators shall only be applied to operands of unsigned underlying type.
messages.translation: 按位运算符只得用于无符号底层类型的操作数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-1: Each operand of a logical && or | | shall be a postfix-expression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-1: Each operand of a logical && or | | shall be a postfix-expression.
messages.translation: 逻辑运算符&&或||的每个操作数都必须是后缀表达式

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-2: A pointer to a virtual base class shall only be cast to a pointer to a derived class by means of dynamic_cast.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-2: A pointer to a virtual base class shall only be cast to a pointer to a derived class by means of dynamic_cast.
messages.translation: 一个指向虚基类（virtual base class）的指针只能通过dynamic_cast的方式被转换为一个指向派生类（derived class）的指针

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-3: Casts from a base class to a derived class should not be performed on polymorphic types.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-3: Casts from a base class to a derived class should not be performed on polymorphic types.
messages.translation: 不应对多态类型（polymorphic types）进行从基类到派生类的转换

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-4: C-style casts (other than void casts) and functional notation casts (other than explicit constructor call) shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-4: C-style casts (other than void casts) and functional notation casts (other than explicit constructor call) shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用C风格的转换（除了void转换）和函数式记法转换（除了显式构造函数调用）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-5: A cast shall not remove any const or volatile qualification from the type of a pointer or reference.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-5: A cast shall not remove any const or volatile qualification from the type of a pointer or reference.
messages.translation: 显式类型转换不得移除指针类型或引用类型的任何const或volatile修饰

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-6: A cast shall not convert a pointer to a function to any other pointer type, including a pointer to function type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-6: A cast shall not convert a pointer to a function to any other pointer type, including a pointer to function type.
messages.translation: 显式类型转换不得将一个函数指针转换为任何其他指针类型，包括函数指针类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-7: An object with pointer type shall not be converted to an unrelated pointer type, either directly or indirectly.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-7: An object with pointer type shall not be converted to an unrelated pointer type, either directly or indirectly.
messages.translation: 不得直接或间接将一个具有指针类型的对象转换为不相关的指针类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-8: An object with integer type or pointer to void type shall not be converted to an object with poiner type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-8: An object with integer type or pointer to void type shall not be converted to an object with poiner type.
messages.translation: 不得将具有整数类型或void指针类型的对象转换为具有指针类型的对象

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-9: A cast should not convert a pointer type to an integral type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-9: A cast should not convert a pointer type to an integral type.
messages.translation: 显式转换不应把指针类型转换为整数类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-10: The increment (++) and decrement (--) operators should not be mixed with other operators in an exression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-10: The increment (++) and decrement (--) operators should not be mixed with other operators in an exression.
messages.translation: 在表达式中，自增（++）和自减（--）运算符不应与其他运算符混合使用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-11: The comma operator, && operator and the || operator shall not be overloaded.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-11: The comma operator, && operator and the || operator shall not be overloaded.
messages.translation: 不得重载逗号运算符、&&运算符和||运算符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-12: An identifier with array type passed as a function argument shall not decay to a pointer.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-2-12: An identifier with array type passed as a function argument shall not decay to a pointer.
messages.translation: 作为函数实参传递的数组类型的标识符不得退化为指针

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-1: Each operand of the ! operator, the logical && or the logical operators shall have type bool.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-1: Each operand of the ! operator, the logical && or the logical operators shall have type bool.
messages.translation: !运算符、逻辑运算符&&或||的每个操作数都必须是bool类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-2: The unary minus operator shall not be applied to an expression whose underlying type is unsigned.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-2: The unary minus operator shall not be applied to an expression whose underlying type is unsigned.
messages.translation: 一元减法运算符不得用于底层类型为无符号类型的表达式

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-3: The unary & operator shall not be overloaded.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-3: The unary & operator shall not be overloaded.
messages.translation: 不得重载一元&操作符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-4: Evaluation of the operand to the sizeof operator shall not contain side effects.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-3-4: Evaluation of the operand to the sizeof operator shall not contain side effects.
messages.translation: sizeof运算符的操作数的求值不得含有副作用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-8-1: The right hand operand of a shift operator shall lie between zero and one less than the width in bits of the underlying type of the left hand operand.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-8-1: The right hand operand of a shift operator shall lie between zero and one less than the width in bits of the underlying type of the left hand operand.
messages.translation: 移位运算符的右操作数的范围下限为零，上限须比左操作数的底层类型的位宽度小一

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-14-1: The right hand operand of a logical && or || operator shall not contain side effects.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-14-1: The right hand operand of a logical && or || operator shall not contain side effects.
messages.translation: 逻辑与（&&）和逻辑或（||）运算符的右操作数不得含有副作用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-17-1: The semantic equivalence between a binary operator and its asignment operator form shall be preserved.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-17-1: The semantic equivalence between a binary operator and its asignment operator form shall be preserved.
messages.translation: 必须保留二元运算符及其赋值运算符形式之间的语义等价

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-18-1: The comma operator shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-18-1: The comma operator shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用逗号运算符（,）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-19-1: Evaluation of constant unsigned integer expressions should not lead to wrap-around.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 5-19-1: Evaluation of constant unsigned integer expressions should not lead to wrap-around.
messages.translation: 对无符号常量表达式进行求值不应导致回绕

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-2-1: Assignment operators shall not be used in sub-expressions.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-2-1: Assignment operators shall not be used in sub-expressions.
messages.translation: 不得在子表达式中使用赋值运算符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-2-2: Floating-point expressions shall not be directly or indirectly tested for equality or inequality.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-2-2: Floating-point expressions shall not be directly or indirectly tested for equality or inequality.
messages.translation: 不得直接或间接地对浮点表达式进行相等性或不等性测试

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-2-3: Before preprocessing, a null statement shall only occur on a line by itself; it may be followed by a comment, provided that the first character following the null statement is a white-space character.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-2-3: Before preprocessing, a null statement shall only occur on a line by itself; it may be followed by a comment, provided that the first character following the null statement is a white-space character.
messages.translation: 在预处理之前，null语句只能单独一行出现；如果null语句后接的第一个字符是空格，该null语句可后接一条注释

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-3-1: The statement forming the body of a switch, while, do ... while or for statement shall be a compound statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-3-1: The statement forming the body of a switch, while, do ... while or for statement shall be a compound statement.
messages.translation: 构成switch、while、do...while或for语句主体的语句必须为复合语句

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-1: An if (condition) construct shall be followed by a compound statement. The else keyword shall be followed by either a compound statement, or another if statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-1: An if (condition) construct shall be followed by a compound statement. The else keyword shall be followed by either a compound statement, or another if statement.
messages.translation: 一个if（条件）结构必须后接一个复合语句；else关键字必须后接一个复合语句或另一个if语句

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-2: All if ... else if constructs shall be terminated with an else clause.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-2: All if ... else if constructs shall be terminated with an else clause.
messages.translation: 所有if … else if结构都必须以一个else语句终止

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-3: A switch statement shall be a well-formed switch statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-3: A switch statement shall be a well-formed switch statement.
messages.translation: switch语句必须为良构（well-formed）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-4: A switch-label shall only be used when the most closely-enclosing compound statement is the body of a switch statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-4: A switch-label shall only be used when the most closely-enclosing compound statement is the body of a switch statement.
messages.translation: switch标号只得出现在构成switch语句主体的复合语句的最外层

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-5: An unconditional throw or break statement shall terminate every non-empty switch-clause.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-5: An unconditional throw or break statement shall terminate every non-empty switch-clause.
messages.translation: 每个非空的switch子句都必须以一个无条件的throw或break语句终止

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-6: The final clause of a switch statement shall be the default-clause.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-6: The final clause of a switch statement shall be the default-clause.
messages.translation: switch语句的最后一个子句必须是default子句

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-7: The condition of a switch statement shall not have bool type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-7: The condition of a switch statement shall not have bool type.
messages.translation: switch语句的条件不得是bool类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-8: Every switch statement shall have at least one case-clause,
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-4-8: Every switch statement shall have at least one case-clause,
messages.translation: 每个switch语句至少必须有一个case子句

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-1: A for loop shall contain a single loop-counter which shall not have floating type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-1: A for loop shall contain a single loop-counter which shall not have floating type.
messages.translation: for循环中必须有且仅有一个循环计数器，该计数器不得为浮点类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-2: If loop-counter is not modified by -- or ++, then, within condition, the loop-counter shall only be used as an operand to <=, <, > or >=.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-2: If loop-counter is not modified by -- or ++, then, within condition, the loop-counter shall only be used as an operand to <=, <, > or >=.
messages.translation: 如果循环计数器不被--或++修改，那么在条件中，循环计数器只能作为<=、<、>或>=的操作数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-3: The loop-counter shall not be modified within statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-3: The loop-counter shall not be modified within statement.
messages.translation: 不得在条件或语句中修改循环计数器

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-4: The loop-counter shall be modified by one of: --, ++,-=n, or +=n; where n remains constant for the duration of the loop.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-4: The loop-counter shall be modified by one of: --, ++,-=n, or +=n; where n remains constant for the duration of the loop.
messages.translation: 循环计数器应通过以下方式之一进行修改：--、++、-=n或+=n；其中n在循环过程中保持不变

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-5: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter shall not be modified within condition or expression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-5: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter shall not be modified within condition or expression.
messages.translation: 不得在条件或表达式中修改循环控制变量（循环计数器除外）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-6: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter which is modified in statement shall have type bool.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-5-6: A loop-control-variable other than the loop-counter which is modified in statement shall have type bool.
messages.translation: 除了在语句中被修改的循环计数器外，其他的循环控制变量应具有bool类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-1: Any label referenced by a goto statement shall be declared in the same block, or in a block enclosing the goto statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-1: Any label referenced by a goto statement shall be declared in the same block, or in a block enclosing the goto statement.
messages.translation: goto语句引用的标号（label）必须在同一代码块或上级代码块中声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-2: The goto statement shall jump to a label declared later in the same function body.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-2: The goto statement shall jump to a label declared later in the same function body.
messages.translation: goto语句只得跳转到同一函数主体中在其后声明的标号（label）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-3: The continue statement shall only be used within a well-formed for loop.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-3: The continue statement shall only be used within a well-formed for loop.
messages.translation: continue语句只能在为良构（well-formed）的for循环中使用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-4: For any iteration statement there shall be no more than one break or goto statement used for loop termination.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-4: For any iteration statement there shall be no more than one break or goto statement used for loop termination.
messages.translation: 对于任何迭代语句，用于终止循环的break或goto语句不得超过一个

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-5: A function shall have a single point of exit at the end of the function.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 6-6-5: A function shall have a single point of exit at the end of the function.
messages.translation: 函数结尾必须有且仅有一个退出点

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-1-1: A variable which is not modified shall be const qualified.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-1-1: A variable which is not modified shall be const qualified.
messages.translation: 不修改的变量必须使用const修饰

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-1-2: A pointer or reference parameter in a function shall be declared as pointer to const or reference to const if the corresponding object is not modified.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-1-2: A pointer or reference parameter in a function shall be declared as pointer to const or reference to const if the corresponding object is not modified.
messages.translation: 如果函数形参不被修改，那么必须将相对应的形参的指针或引用声明为const指针或const引用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-2-1: An expression with enum underlying type shall only have values corresponding to the enumerators of the enumeration.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-2-1: An expression with enum underlying type shall only have values corresponding to the enumerators of the enumeration.
messages.translation: 具有enum底层类型的表达式只应包含与枚举的枚举器对应的值

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-1: The global namespace shall only contain main, namespace declarations and extern "C" declarations.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-1: The global namespace shall only contain main, namespace declarations and extern "C" declarations.
messages.translation: 全局命名空间只得包含main、命名空间声明和extern “C”声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-2: The identifier main shall not be used for a function other than the global function main.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-2: The identifier main shall not be used for a function other than the global function main.
messages.translation: 标识符main不得用于除全局函数main之外的函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-3: There shall be no unnamed namespaces in header files.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-3: There shall be no unnamed namespaces in header files.
messages.translation: 头文件中不得存在未命名的命名空间

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-4: using-directives shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-4: using-directives shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用using指令

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-5: Multiple declarations for an identifier in the same namespace shall not straddle a using-declaration for that idenifier.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-5: Multiple declarations for an identifier in the same namespace shall not straddle a using-declaration for that idenifier.
messages.translation: 同一命名空间中对一个标识符的多个声明不得跨越该标识符的using声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-6: using-directives and using-declarations (excluding class scope or function scope using-declarations) shall not be used in header files.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-3-6: using-directives and using-declarations (excluding class scope or function scope using-declarations) shall not be used in header files.
messages.translation: 不得在头文件中使用using指令或using声明（不包括类作用域或函数作用域的using声明）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-4-1: All usage of assembler shall be documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-4-1: All usage of assembler shall be documented.
messages.translation: 所有汇编器的使用必须有文档记录

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-4-2: Assembler instructions shall only be introduced using the asm declaration.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-4-2: Assembler instructions shall only be introduced using the asm declaration.
messages.translation: 只能使用asm声明引入汇编器指令（assembler instructions）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-4-3: Assembly language shall be encapsulated and isolated.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-4-3: Assembly language shall be encapsulated and isolated.
messages.translation: 必须独立封装汇编语言

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-1: A function shall not return a reference or a pointer to an automatic variable (including parameters) defined within the function.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-1: A function shall not return a reference or a pointer to an automatic variable (including parameters) defined within the function.
messages.translation: 函数不应返回在该函数中定义的自动变量（包括形参）的引用或指针

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-2: The address of an object with automatic storage shall not be assigned to another object that may persist after the first object has ceased to exist.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-2: The address of an object with automatic storage shall not be assigned to another object that may persist after the first object has ceased to exist.
messages.translation: 不得将自动存储对象的地址赋给在该对象不复存在后仍然可能存在的另一个对象

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-3: A function shall not return a reference or a pointer to a parameter that is passed by reference or const reference.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-3: A function shall not return a reference or a pointer to a parameter that is passed by reference or const reference.
messages.translation: 如果一个形参是通过引用或const引用传递的，那么函数不得返回该形参的引用或指针

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-4: Functions should not call themselves, either directly or indirectly.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 7-5-4: Functions should not call themselves, either directly or indirectly.
messages.translation: 函数不应直接或间接调用自身

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-0-1: An init-declarator-list or a member-declarator-list shall consist of a single init-declarator or member-declarator respectively.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-0-1: An init-declarator-list or a member-declarator-list shall consist of a single init-declarator or member-declarator respectively.
messages.translation: 初始化声明符列表（init-declarator-list）必须由一个初始化声明符组成；成员声明符列表（member-declarator-list）必须由一个成员声明符组成

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-3-1: Parameters in an overriding virtual function shall either use the same default arguments as the function they ovrride, or else shall not specify any default arguments.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-3-1: Parameters in an overriding virtual function shall either use the same default arguments as the function they ovrride, or else shall not specify any default arguments.
messages.translation: 覆盖虚拟函数中的形参必须使用与被它们覆盖的函数相同的默认实参，否则不得指定任何默认实参

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-1: Functions shall not be defined using the ellipsis notation.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-1: Functions shall not be defined using the ellipsis notation.
messages.translation: 不得使用省略号定义函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-2: The identifiers used for the parameters in a re-declaration of a function shall be identical to those in the declaration.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-2: The identifiers used for the parameters in a re-declaration of a function shall be identical to those in the declaration.
messages.translation: 函数的重新声明中用作形参的标识符必须与原声明中的标识符相同

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-3: All exit paths from a function with non-void return type shall have an explicit return statement with an expression.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-3: All exit paths from a function with non-void return type shall have an explicit return statement with an expression.
messages.translation: 返回非void类型的函数的所有退出路径都必须具有包含表达式的显式return语句

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-4: A function identifier shall either be used to call the function or it shall be preceded by &.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-4-4: A function identifier shall either be used to call the function or it shall be preceded by &.
messages.translation: 函数标识符必须用来调用该函数，否则必须加上前缀“&”

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-5-1: All variables shall have a defined value before they are used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-5-1: All variables shall have a defined value before they are used.
messages.translation: 所有变量在使用前都必须先定义一个值

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-5-2: Braces shall be used to indicate and match the structure in the non-zero initialization of arrays and structures.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-5-2: Braces shall be used to indicate and match the structure in the non-zero initialization of arrays and structures.
messages.translation: 数组和结构体进行非零初始化时，必须使用大括号来指示和匹配结构

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-5-3: In an enumerator list, the = construct shall not be used to explicitly initialize members other than the first, unless all items are explicitly initialized.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 8-5-3: In an enumerator list, the = construct shall not be used to explicitly initialize members other than the first, unless all items are explicitly initialized.
messages.translation: 枚举器列表中，不得将=结构用于显式初始化非首位成员之外的成员，除非所有的项都被显式初始化

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-3-1: const member functions shall not return non-const pointers or references to class-data.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-3-1: const member functions shall not return non-const pointers or references to class-data.
messages.translation: const成员函数不得返回对 *类数据* 的非const指针或引用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-3-2: Member functions shall not return non-const handles to class-data.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-3-2: Member functions shall not return non-const handles to class-data.
messages.translation: 成员函数不得返回指向类数据的非const句柄

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-3-3: If a member function can be made static then it shall be made static, otherwise if it can be made const then it shall be made const.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-3-3: If a member function can be made static then it shall be made static, otherwise if it can be made const then it shall be made const.
messages.translation: 如果一个成员函数可以是静态的，那么就必须将其设为静态，否则，如果该函数可以是const的，那么就必须将其设为const

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-5-1: Unions shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-5-1: Unions shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用联合体

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-1: When the absolute positioning of bits representing a bit-field is required, then the behaviour and packing of bit-fields shall be documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-1: When the absolute positioning of bits representing a bit-field is required, then the behaviour and packing of bit-fields shall be documented.
messages.translation: 需要对代表一个位域的位进行绝对定位时，必须记录位域的行为和包装

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-2: Bit-fields shall be either bool type or an explicitly unsigned or signed integral type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-2: Bit-fields shall be either bool type or an explicitly unsigned or signed integral type.
messages.translation: 位域必须是bool类型，或显式无符号或有符号整数类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-3: Bit-fields shall not have enum type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-3: Bit-fields shall not have enum type.
messages.translation: 位域不得具有enum类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-4: Named bit-fields with signed integer type shall have a length of more than one bit.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 9-6-4: Named bit-fields with signed integer type shall have a length of more than one bit.
messages.translation: 已命名的有符号整数类型的位域长度必须超过一位

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-1-1: Classes should not be derived from virtual bases.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-1-1: Classes should not be derived from virtual bases.
messages.translation: 不应通过虚拟基来派生类

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-1-2: A base class shall only be declared virtual if it is used in a diamond hierarchy.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-1-2: A base class shall only be declared virtual if it is used in a diamond hierarchy.
messages.translation: 只有在用于菱形层次结构（diamond hierarchy）时，才能声明一个基类为虚拟基类

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-1-3: An accessible base class shall not be both virtual and non-virtual in the same hierarchy.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-1-3: An accessible base class shall not be both virtual and non-virtual in the same hierarchy.
messages.translation: 可访问基类在同一层次结构中不能同时为虚基类和非虚基类

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-2-1: All accessible entity names within a multiple inheritance hierarchy should be unique.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-2-1: All accessible entity names within a multiple inheritance hierarchy should be unique.
messages.translation: 在一个多重继承层次结构中，所有可访问的实体名称都应该是唯一的

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-3-1: There shall be no more than one definition of each virtual function on each path through the inheritance hierarchy.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-3-1: There shall be no more than one definition of each virtual function on each path through the inheritance hierarchy.
messages.translation: 在整个继承层次结构中，每个虚拟函数在每个路径中的定义不应超过一个

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-3-2: Each overriding virtual function shall be declared with the virtual keyword.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-3-2: Each overriding virtual function shall be declared with the virtual keyword.
messages.translation: 每个覆盖虚拟函数都必须用关键字virtual来声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-3-3: A virtual function shall only be overridden by a pure virtual function if it is itself declared as pure virtual.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 10-3-3: A virtual function shall only be overridden by a pure virtual function if it is itself declared as pure virtual.
messages.translation: 如果虚拟函数被声明为纯虚函数，则该虚拟函数只应被纯虚函数覆盖

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 11-0-1: Member data in non-POD class types shall be private.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 11-0-1: Member data in non-POD class types shall be private.
messages.translation: 在非POD类中，成员数据必须是私有的

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-1-1: An object's dynamic type shall not be used from the body of its constructor or destructor.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-1-1: An object's dynamic type shall not be used from the body of its constructor or destructor.
messages.translation: 不得在一个对象的构造函数或析构函数的主体中使用该对象的动态类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-1-2: AlI constructors of a class should explicitly call a constructor for all of its immediate base classes and all virtual base classes.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-1-2: AlI constructors of a class should explicitly call a constructor for all of its immediate base classes and all virtual base classes.
messages.translation: 所有类构造函数都应明确地调用它们所有直接基类和虚拟基类的构造函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-1-3: All constructors that are callable with a single argument of fundamental type shall be declared explicit.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-1-3: All constructors that are callable with a single argument of fundamental type shall be declared explicit.
messages.translation: 所有可以通过一个基本类型的实参来调用的构造函数都必须被显式声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-8-1: A copy constructor shall only initialize its base classes and the non-static members of the class of which it is a member.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-8-1: A copy constructor shall only initialize its base classes and the non-static members of the class of which it is a member.
messages.translation: 复制构造函数（copy constructor）只得用来初始化它的基类以及本类的非静态成员

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-8-2: The copy assignment operator shall be declared protected or private in an abstract class.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 12-8-2: The copy assignment operator shall be declared protected or private in an abstract class.
messages.translation: 在抽象类中，复制赋值运算符必须被声明为受保护的（protected）或私有的（private）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-5-1: A non-member genericfunction shall only be declared in a namespace that is not an associated namespace.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-5-1: A non-member genericfunction shall only be declared in a namespace that is not an associated namespace.
messages.translation: 非成员泛型函数只能在不是关联命名空间（associated namespace）的命名空间中声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-5-2: A copy constructor shall be declared when there is a template constuctor with a single parameter that is a generic parameter.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-5-2: A copy constructor shall be declared when there is a template constuctor with a single parameter that is a generic parameter.
messages.translation: 如果模板构造函数只有一个形参，且为泛型形参，那么必须声明一个复制构造函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-5-3: A copy assignment operator shall be declared when there is a template assignment operator with a parameter that is a generic parameter:
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-5-3: A copy assignment operator shall be declared when there is a template assignment operator with a parameter that is a generic parameter:
messages.translation: 如果模板赋值运算符有一个泛型形参，那么必须声明一个复制赋值运算符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-6-1: In a class template with a dependent base, any name that may be found in that dependent base shall be referred to using a qualified-id or this->.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-6-1: In a class template with a dependent base, any name that may be found in that dependent base shall be referred to using a qualified-id or this->.
messages.translation: 在一个有依赖基的类模板中，必须使用被修饰的标识符或this->来引用任何可能在该依赖基中查找到的名称

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-6-2: The function chosen by overload resolution shall resolve to a function declared previously in the translation unit.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-6-2: The function chosen by overload resolution shall resolve to a function declared previously in the translation unit.
messages.translation: 通过重载解析选择的函数必须被解析为翻译单元中先前声明的函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-7-1: All class templates, function templates, class template member functions and class template static members shall be instantiated at least once.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-7-1: All class templates, function templates, class template member functions and class template static members shall be instantiated at least once.
messages.translation: 所有类模板、函数模板、类模板成员函数和类模板静态成员至少必须被实例化一次

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-7-2: For any given template specialization, an explicit instantiation of the template with the template arguments used in the specializaion shall not render the program ill-formed
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-7-2: For any given template specialization, an explicit instantiation of the template with the template arguments used in the specializaion shall not render the program ill-formed
messages.translation: 对于任何给定的模板专门化，使用专门化的模板实参对该模板进行显式实例化，不得导致程序非良构（ill-formed）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-7-3: All partial and explicit specializations for a template shall be declared in the same file as the declaration of their primary template.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-7-3: All partial and explicit specializations for a template shall be declared in the same file as the declaration of their primary template.
messages.translation: 模板的所有部分专门化和显式专门化的声明必须与主模板的声明在同一文件

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-8-1: Overloaded function templates shall not be explicitly specialized.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-8-1: Overloaded function templates shall not be explicitly specialized.
messages.translation: 重载的函数模板不得被显式专门化

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-8-2: The viable function set for a function call should either contain no function specializaions, or only contain function specializations.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 14-8-2: The viable function set for a function call should either contain no function specializaions, or only contain function specializations.
messages.translation: 对函数调用可行的函数集不应包含任何函数专门化，或者应只包含函数函数专门化

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-0-1: Exceptions shall only be used for error handling.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-0-1: Exceptions shall only be used for error handling.
messages.translation: 异常只得用于错误处理

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-0-2: An exception object should not have pointer type.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-0-2: An exception object should not have pointer type.
messages.translation: 异常对象不应具有指针类型

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-0-3: Control shall not be transferred into a try or catch block using a goto or a switch statement.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-0-3: Control shall not be transferred into a try or catch block using a goto or a switch statement.
messages.translation: 不得使用goto或switch语句将控制权转移到try或catch块中

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-1-1: The assignment-expression of a throw statement shall not itself cause an exception to be thrown.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-1-1: The assignment-expression of a throw statement shall not itself cause an exception to be thrown.
messages.translation: throw语句的赋值表达式本身不得导致抛出异常

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-1-2: NULL shall not be thrown explicitly.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-1-2: NULL shall not be thrown explicitly.
messages.translation: 不得显式抛出NULL

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-1-3: An empty throw (throw;) shall only be used in the compound-statement of a catch handler.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-1-3: An empty throw (throw;) shall only be used in the compound-statement of a catch handler.
messages.translation: 空的抛出（throw;）只得在捕获（catch）处理程序的复合语句中使用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-1: Exceptions shall be raised only after start-up and before termination of the program.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-1: Exceptions shall be raised only after start-up and before termination of the program.
messages.translation: 只有程序启动后和终止前才能报告异常

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-2: There should be at least one exception handler to catch all otherwise unhandled exceptions.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-2: There should be at least one exception handler to catch all otherwise unhandled exceptions.
messages.translation: 至少应该有一个异常处理程序来捕获所有未经处理的异常

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-3: Handlers of a function-try-block implementation of a class constructor or destructor shall not reference non-static members from this class or its bases.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-3: Handlers of a function-try-block implementation of a class constructor or destructor shall not reference non-static members from this class or its bases.
messages.translation: 对于类构造函数或类析构函数，其函数尝试块实现的处理程序不得引用该类或其基类的非静态成员

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-4: Each exception explicitly thrown in the code shall have a handler of a compatible type in all calll paths that could lead to that point.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-4: Each exception explicitly thrown in the code shall have a handler of a compatible type in all calll paths that could lead to that point.
messages.translation: 对于在代码中显式抛出的每个异常，在所有可能导致该异常的调用路径上，都必须有一个兼容类型的处理程序

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-5: A class type exception shall always be caught by reference.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-5: A class type exception shall always be caught by reference.
messages.translation: 必须始终通过引用来捕获类类型的异常

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-6: Where multiple handlers are provided in a single try-catch statement or, fuction-try-block for a derived class and some or all of its bases, the handlers shall be ordered most-derived to base class.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-6: Where multiple handlers are provided in a single try-catch statement or, fuction-try-block for a derived class and some or all of its bases, the handlers shall be ordered most-derived to base class.
messages.translation: 如果在一个尝试捕获（try-catch）语句或函数尝试块中，为一个派生类以及它的部分或全部基类提供了多个处理程序，那么应按从最终派生类到基类的顺序排列这些处理程序

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-7: Where multiple handlers are provided in a single try-catch statement or function-try-block, any elipsis (catch-all) handler shall occur last.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-3-7: Where multiple handlers are provided in a single try-catch statement or function-try-block, any elipsis (catch-all) handler shall occur last.
messages.translation: 如果在一个尝试捕获语句或函数尝试块中提供了多个处理程序，那么所有省略号（catch-all）处理程序必须在最后发生

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-4-1: If a function is declared with an exception-specification, then all declarations of the same function (in other translaion units) shall be declared with the same set of type -ids.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-4-1: If a function is declared with an exception-specification, then all declarations of the same function (in other translaion units) shall be declared with the same set of type -ids.
messages.translation: 如果一个函数与异常说明（exception-specification）一起声明，那么该函数在其他翻译单元中的所有声明必须以相同的类型标识（type-id）集声明

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-5-1: A class destructor shall not exit with an exception.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-5-1: A class destructor shall not exit with an exception.
messages.translation: 一个类析构函数不得随着异常退出

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-5-2: Where a function's declaration includes an exception-specification, the function shall only be capable of throwing exceptions of the indicated type(s).
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-5-2: Where a function's declaration includes an exception-specification, the function shall only be capable of throwing exceptions of the indicated type(s).
messages.translation: 当函数的声明包含一个异常说明时，该函数只能抛出指定类型的异常

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-5-3: The terminate() function shall not be called implicitly.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 15-5-3: The terminate() function shall not be called implicitly.
messages.translation: 不得隐式调用terminate()函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-1: #include directives in a file shall only be preceded by other preprocessor directives or comments.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-1: #include directives in a file shall only be preceded by other preprocessor directives or comments.
messages.translation: 文件中的#include指令之前只能是其他预处理指令或注释

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-2: Macros shall only be #define’d or #undef'd in the global namespace.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-2: Macros shall only be #define’d or #undef'd in the global namespace.
messages.translation: 只能在全局命名空间中对宏进行#define和#undef

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-3: #undef shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-3: #undef shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用#undef

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-4: Function-like macros shall not be defined.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-4: Function-like macros shall not be defined.
messages.translation: 不得定义类函数宏

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-5: Arguments to a function-like macro shall not contain tokens that look like preprocessing directives.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-5: Arguments to a function-like macro shall not contain tokens that look like preprocessing directives.
messages.translation: 传递给类函数宏的实参不得包含形似预处理指令的标记

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-6: In the definition of a function-like macro, each instance of a parameter shall be enclosed in parentheses, unless it is used as the operand of # or ##.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-6: In the definition of a function-like macro, each instance of a parameter shall be enclosed in parentheses, unless it is used as the operand of # or ##.
messages.translation: 在定义类函数宏时，每个实参的实例都必须以小括号括起来，除非它们是#或##的操作数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-7: Undefined macro identifiers shall not be used in #if or #elif preprocessor directives, except as operands to the defined operator.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-7: Undefined macro identifiers shall not be used in #if or #elif preprocessor directives, except as operands to the defined operator.
messages.translation: 未定义的宏标识符不得用于#if和#elif预处理指令，除非是作为defined预处理运算符的操作数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-8: If the # token appears as the first token on a line, then it shall be immediately followed by a preprocessing token.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-0-8: If the # token appears as the first token on a line, then it shall be immediately followed by a preprocessing token.
messages.translation: 如果#标识符是行中的第一个标记，则其后应紧接预处理标识符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-1-1: The defined preprocessor operator shall only be used in one of the two standard forms.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-1-1: The defined preprocessor operator shall only be used in one of the two standard forms.
messages.translation: defined预处理运算符只能使用两种标准形式之一

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-1-2: All #else, #elif and #endif preprocessor directives shall reside in the same file as the #if or #ifdef directive to which they are related.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-1-2: All #else, #elif and #endif preprocessor directives shall reside in the same file as the #if or #ifdef directive to which they are related.
messages.translation: 所有的 #else、#elif 和 #endif 预处理指令必须都必须和对应的 #if 或 #ifdef 指令位于同一文件中

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-1: The pre-processor shall only be used for file inclusion and include guards.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-1: The pre-processor shall only be used for file inclusion and include guards.
messages.translation: 预处理器只得用于文件包含和#include防范（include guard）

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-2: C++ macros shall only be used for include guards, type qualifiers, or storage class specifiers.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-2: C++ macros shall only be used for include guards, type qualifiers, or storage class specifiers.
messages.translation: C++的宏只得用于#include防范、类型限定符或存储类标识符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-3: Include guards shall be provided.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-3: Include guards shall be provided.
messages.translation: 必须提供#include防范

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-4: The ', ", /* or // characters shall not occur in a header file name.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-4: The ', ", /* or // characters shall not occur in a header file name.
messages.translation: 头文件名称里不得出现'、"、/*或//字符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-5: The \ character should not occur in a header file name.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-5: The \ character should not occur in a header file name.
messages.translation: 头文件名称里不能出现\字符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-6: The #include directive shall be followed by either a <filename> or "filename" sequence.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-2-6: The #include directive shall be followed by either a <filename> or "filename" sequence.
messages.translation: #include 预处理指令必须后接<filename>或"filename"

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-3-1: There shall be at most one occurrence of the # or ## operators in a single macro definition.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-3-1: There shall be at most one occurrence of the # or ## operators in a single macro definition.
messages.translation: 在一个宏定义中最多只得出现一个#或##预处理器运算符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-3-2: The # and ## operators should not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-3-2: The # and ## operators should not be used.
messages.translation: 不应使用#或##预处理器运算符

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-6-1: All uses of the #pragma directive shall be documented.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 16-6-1: All uses of the #pragma directive shall be documented.
messages.translation: 必须记录所有#pragma指令的使用

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-1: Reserved identifiers, macros and functions in the standard library shall not be defined, redefined or undefined.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-1: Reserved identifiers, macros and functions in the standard library shall not be defined, redefined or undefined.
messages.translation: 标准库中保留的标识符、宏和函数不得被定义、重定义或取消定义

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-2: The names of standard library macros and objects shall not be reused.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-2: The names of standard library macros and objects shall not be reused.
messages.translation: 不得重复使用标准库中宏和对象的名字

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-3: The names of standard library functions shall not be overridden.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-3: The names of standard library functions shall not be overridden.
messages.translation: 不得重写标准库中函数的名称

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-4: All library code shall conform to MISRA C++.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-4: All library code shall conform to MISRA C++.
messages.translation: 所有库代码必须遵守MISRA C++规则

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-5: The setjmp macro and the longjmp function shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 17-0-5: The setjmp macro and the longjmp function shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用setjmp宏和longjmp函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-1: The C library shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-1: The C library shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用C标准库

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-2: The library functions atof, atoi and atol from library <cstdlib> shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-2: The library functions atof, atoi and atol from library <cstdlib> shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用库<cstdlib>中的函数atof、atoi 和 atol

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-3: The library functions abort, exit, getenv and system from library <cstdlib> shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-3: The library functions abort, exit, getenv and system from library <cstdlib> shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用库<stdlib.h>中的函数 abort、exit、getenv 和 system

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-4: The time handling functions of library <ctime> shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-4: The time handling functions of library <ctime> shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用库<ctime>中的时间处理函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-5: The unbounded functions of library <cstring> shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-0-5: The unbounded functions of library <cstring> shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用库<cstring>中的无界函数

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-2-1: The macro offsetof shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-2-1: The macro offsetof shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用宏offsetof

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-4-1: Dynamic heap memory allocation shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-4-1: Dynamic heap memory allocation shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用动态堆内存分配

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-7-1: The signal handling facilities of <csignal> shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 18-7-1: The signal handling facilities of <csignal> shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用<csignal>中的信号处理功能

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 19-3-1: The error indicator errno shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 19-3-1: The error indicator errno shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用错误指示器errno

messages.id: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 27-0-1: The stream input/output library <cstdio> shall not be used.
messages.message: Violation of MISRA C++:2008 Rule 27-0-1: The stream input/output library <cstdio> shall not be used.
messages.translation: 不得使用输入/输出流库<cstdio>
